name: box-ui-elements-heroku
description: A React and Node JS (express) sample with support for Salesforce CanvasApp Signed Request handling

BOX_CONFIG.description: Add the contents of your generated Box application JSON file

REACT_APP_HOST.description: Add the name of your Heroku app

SALESFORCE_DOMAIN.description: Add the domain for your Salesforce Org

SIGNED_REQUEST_CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Add the CONSUMER SECRET from your Salesforce CanvasApp
